titles.title: Veterans TBI Adaptive Care Opportunities Nationwide Act of 2025
Veterans TBI Adaptive Care Opportunities Nationwide Act of 2025

A bill to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out a program to award grants to eligible entities to develop, implement, and evaluate approaches and methodologies for prospective randomized control trials for neurorehabilitation treatments for the treatment of chronic mild traumatic brain injury in veterans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
